H3.text: American singer Al, late British television host Hughie and British businessman Philip all share which surname. Green

A4.text: Albert Leornes Greene was born on April 13, 1946, in Forrest City, Arkansas, as the sixth of ten children born to Cora Lee and sharecropper Robert G. Greene Jr.

A5.text: Albert Leornes Greene (born April 13, 1946), known professionally as Al Green, is an American singer, songwriter, pastor and record producer.

A6.text: Hugh Hughes Green OStJ was an English radio and television presenter, game show host and actor.
